ygData.subject: Re: Keys in CB
ygData.msgSnippet: ****Spoiler**** Give 1 Copper piece to the slaves located around the mine.  They will tell you what number key they need to be set free. - Ziff ... From: David
ygData.messageBody:
****Spoiler****

Give 1 Copper piece to the slaves located around the mine. They will tell
you what number key they need to be set free.

- Ziff

-----Original Message-----
From: David Platt [mailto:davidp@...]
Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 4:38 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Keys in CB<spoiler info>


From: David Platt <davidp@...>

Greetings fellow members of the wizard's guild.

Can anyone tell me what slaver keys 22, 23, and 24 are for in Crushbone?
The other keys of course will free the slaves when given to the proper
slave. If you give each slave a copper they tell you which key they need to
be set free. As of yet none of the slaves have asked for key's 22 - 24.
Could there be a hidden area in CB possibly?

Thanks for any help on this.

Mirrin of Rodcet Nife
